happy_box.challenge_section_description_1: The vibrant spirit of Tet, brimming with the colors of spring, has filled every corner of Wellspring Saigon! This is the perfect time for every WISer to pause, reflect on the past year refresh themselves, spread love, and create meaningful Tet memories.
happy_box.challenge_section_description_2: Are you ready for the 6-Day Tet Challenge? â€“ a journey to capture radiant moments, embracing the festive essence of Wellspring Festival 2025 - Happy Home Grows My Spring!
happy_box.challenge_section_description_3: Get your best angles ready and join us in welcoming a truly unforgettable Tet season.
happy_box.video_section_gift_description_4: will receive gifts from the Organizers.
happy_box.video_section_countdown_description_3: See you WISers at the spring festival on the upcoming

happy_box.thankyou_modal_description_3: Wishing WISer a new year full of joy and happiness
